message: I could use some extra brainpower in making my custom proton pack. I've been doing a lot of research lately and there are plenty of resources on building an accurate replica of the movie props, including a a good number of people machining parts. I am not content just making a recreation that sits on display or functions as an elaborate costume accessory. Any ideas on how I can make it functional? Since it is supposed to be a "particle accelerator" I've considered using it to accelerate projectiles like paintballs or airsoft pellets.  Heck, silly string could be cool. There are a lot of possibilities as it is simply a pack connected to a wand via hose. Maybe I can have to geekiest leaf blower?

How about pressurized foam like material used by fire depts. I think there is a starch based liquid that expands many times and sorta keeps it's shape for a few minutes. You'd get a big ole stream of goo and all you'd need is some compressed air and a tank with the liquid.
I love that idea, but I'll have to use it for a smile blower, looks like I know have two Ghostbusters projects http://www.gbfans.com/equipment/slime-blower/
